title: Google Play Pass is now available in India with over 1,000 paid apps and games
content:
Google Play Pass is bringing a catalog of paid apps and games to India, nearly three years after launching in other countries.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Play Pass is now available in India with over 1,000 paid apps and games appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After expanding to nearly 100 other countries over the past couple of years, Google Play Pass is finally coming to India this week.
